vistra.app.control.state

Interface IParameterStateHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.event.GraphEventListener<ILayoutVertex,ILayoutEdge>, IControlContext, java.awt.event.ItemListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParameterStateHandler

    public interface IParameterStateHandler
extends IControlContext, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.event.GraphEventListener<ILayoutVertex,ILayoutEdge>
    An interface for a parameter handler: handles a graph and an algorithm as parameter for generating a traversal-object.

    As a part of the graphic user interface control, this state handler is an action listener (file menu for the graph) and an item listener (algorithm combo box), too. Furthermore, this handler listens on graph-events (e.g. the graph got edited or saved).

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    IStepByStep, IAnimation
